stdyInfo.abstract: The collection includes three data-files; - P0741A: Oral Interview (SCP) - P0741C: Drop-off questionnaire (Middendorp) - P0741B: Combination file as used by Middendorp

sumDscr.universe: Age limits: 16-74 years Location: national Name of country: Netherlands

dataColl.sampProc: Multi-stage sample. Number of units original sample: 2648. Losses: 641. Nr. of cases, oral interview: 2007. Nr of cases drop-off questionnaire: 1663.

fileTxt.fileCont: Separate file with only variables from the drop-off questionnaire (Middendorp) in sequence of this questionnaire. Valid response: N=1663
Vraiables from the oral interview only.

Combination of variables from both oral and drop-off questionnaire. The format is the same as used by C.P. Middendorp, i.e. variable-sequence does not conform to the SCP-file or the questionnaires. There are minor differences in coding and missing-value declarations. Scales and constructed variables are not (yet) documented.
